description: HSK 1-3 Official Vocabulary with simple tags associated to all items (Daily Life, Descriptions, Grammar, Location, Objects, People, Numbers, Time, Nature, Expressions)

tag_definitions.Daily Life: Routine activities, common actions, personal care, shopping, transportation, work, school, home life, food, drinks, and everyday interactions. Examples: eat, sleep, work, buy, school, restaurant, money, phone, computer, clothes.
tag_definitions.Descriptions: Words that describe qualities, states, characteristics, or feelings. Includes adjectives, adverbs, and descriptive verbs. Examples: big, small, happy, beautiful, fast, slow, hot, cold, red, expensive, difficult.
tag_definitions.Grammar: Functional words that structure sentences but have little meaning on their own. Particles, measure words, conjunctions, prepositions, and grammatical markers. Examples: 的, 了, 不, 在, 和, 就, 也, 还, 个, 这, 那.
tag_definitions.Location: Physical places, directions, spatial relationships, and positional concepts. Examples: school, hospital, Beijing, inside, outside, above, below, left, right, here, there, home, park.
tag_definitions.Objects: Tangible, concrete items you can touch or hold. Physical things, possessions, and material items. Examples: book, table, water, apple, car, phone, chair, pen, clothes, food items.
tag_definitions.People: Human relationships, roles, professions, body parts, and personal pronouns. Examples: mother, teacher, friend, doctor, hand, head, I, you, he, she, they, child, student.
tag_definitions.Numbers: Numerals, quantities, counting, measurements, and mathematical concepts. Examples: one, ten, hundred, first, some, many, few, half, double, measure words for counting.
tag_definitions.Time: Temporal concepts, periods, durations, and time-related adverbs. Examples: today, now, year, month, hour, minute, early, late, after, before, always, never, soon.
tag_definitions.Nature: Natural world, weather, animals, plants, environments, and geographical features. Examples: cat, dog, flower, tree, mountain, river, rain, sun, weather, sky, earth.
tag_definitions.Expressions: Common phrases, greetings, polite expressions, interjections, and conversational formulas. Examples: hello, thank you, sorry, goodbye, please, yes, no, okay, excuse me, how are you.
